description.value: When you die, a seed sprouts from your body. The seedling is a copy of you lacking any of your memories, though it has vague memories of your relationships and might feel fond of your allies or distrustful of your enemies. Over 1d6 weeks, the seedling grows into a miniature version of you with the same attributes and abilities (but Small instead of Medium). Over 1d6 months, you grow to your original size. A new seedling germinates in you over 10 years; if you die again before then, the seedling dies too.

publication.title: Starfinder Murder in Metal City Deluxe Adventure
